divs: sighting detailsit was 10:15pm on 7\30\2012,i went out on my porch to have a smoke.i was looking up at the trees and sky when there was a bright flash.it was like a strobe light but only one flash.i thought it was a strobe from a plane.i went out to the street to get a better look at the sky wear the flash was.there was no movement or noise of any kind(no planes,helicopters,blimps, etc).at this point i got excited,so i spent the next 15 mins looking around hoping to see what caused the flash.but never found what caused it.the strangest thing was when the flash happened,it seem to light up me and my surroundings.i didn't lose any time.at this time i haven't noticed any affect on the vegetation in the area.
Summary: Fast bright flash.Then there was nothing in the sky.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Milton
There were no other sightings in Milton on or around July 30th 2012
